meanings.definition: A substance or treatment used to make something resistant to catching fire.
meanings.sent1: The flameproofer was applied to the curtains to prevent them from burning easily.
meanings.sent2: The building was treated with flameproofer to protect it from fire damage.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the flameproofer was a new toy to play with.
meanings.sent4: Her determination acted as a flameproofer against the harsh criticism.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter always carries a can of flameproofer for emergencies.

meanings.definition: A person who applies flameproofing treatments.
meanings.sent1: The flameproofer carefully sprayed the solution on the furniture.
meanings.sent2: The flameproofer was praised for their skill in protecting homes from fires.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy flameproofer accidentally spilled the solution on themselves.
meanings.sent4: She was a true flameproofer, always ready to shield others from harm.
meanings.sent5: The experienced flameproofer knew exactly how to treat different materials.
